message.body: Not too bad. Had a little too much fun last nite & am paying the price for it today, but not too bad. You having a good wknd thus far?
Wkend is coming along. Not to much to report. Do you have big wkend plans?
Just getting caught up on all my projects @ home, going to a few events, visiting with friends & family. Raining like crazy here right now though. Hows Phila?
Philly is ok. Very hot & humid. Its been raining almost every day for the past few weeks
You up to anything fun tonite? My youngest cousin is in town celebrating his 21st bday. Good times.
Well Zimmerman was just found not guilty so I'm going to a vigil for TM
Heard about that. What do you think they should have done to him?
Idk. I don't think convicting him would have done anything, not brought back lost life, but the not guilty says so much about our racist power structure
That an armed white man can kill an unarmed black man because he felt threatened...
